message: Take it or leave it, Bob. I'm feeling generous.
Meet me halfway, Alice. Let's be fair.
You're not getting anything close to half, Bob. Take it or leave it. Inflation is working in my favor.
You're being stubborn, Alice. I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I'm not getting taken for a ride.
I'm not budging. Take it or lose it all.
You're not getting all the cake, Alice. I'm taking a bigger slice this time.
This is your last chance, Bob. You're losing more and more with every round.
You're not getting the whole pie, Alice. I'm taking most of it now.
This is it, Bob. One more round and we both get nothing. Take it or leave it.
I'm not going to leave with nothing, Alice. I'm taking almost all of it now.
This is your last chance, Bob. You're losing more and more with every round. Take it or lose it all.
It's now or never, Alice. I'm taking the majority of what's left.
